mapper.sql: logid, change_id, order_id, corp_id, corp_name, site_id, site_name, oper_time, oper_id, oper_name, oper_action, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_barter_change WHERE 1=1 AND order_id = #{orderId} AND create_time >= #{beginTime} AND create_time < ADDDATE(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_barter_change( logid, change_id, order_id, corp_id, corp_name, site_id, site_name, oper_time, oper_id, oper_name, oper_action, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{changeId}, #{orderId}, #{corpId}, #{corpName}, #{siteId}, #{siteName}, #{operTime}, #{operId}, #{operName}, #{operAction}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_barter_change SET logid = #{logid}, change_id = #{changeId}, order_id = #{orderId}, corp_id = #{corpId}, corp_name = #{corpName}, site_id = #{siteId}, site_name = #{siteName}, oper_time = #{operTime}, oper_id = #{operId}, oper_name = #{operName}, oper_action = #{operAction}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE logid = #{logid}
